result.eng: We met each other in Paris.
result.ga: bhuail muid le chéile i bpáras
result.orig: bhuail muid le chéile i bpáras
result.html: bhuail muid le chéile i bpárasWe met each other in Paris.
result.ponchtml: ḃuail muid le ċéile i bpárasWe met each other in Paris.

result.eng: Big money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ga: tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.orig: tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.html: tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ponchtml: tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrṫa gaċ bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.

result.eng: The two businesses are in competition with each other.
result.ga: tá an dá ghnólacht in iomaíocht le chéile
result.orig: tá an dá ghnólacht in iomaíocht le chéile
result.html: tá an dá ghnólacht in iomaíocht le chéileThe two businesses are in competition with each other.
result.ponchtml: tá an dá ġnólaċt in iomaíoċt le ċéileThe two businesses are in competition with each other.

result.ga: téann seán ag rothaíocht gach maidin
result.orig: téann seán ag rothaíocht gach maidin
result.html: téann seán ag rothaíocht gach maidinSeán goes cycling each morning.
result.ponchtml: téann seán ag roṫaíoċt gaċ maidinSeán goes cycling each morning.

result.eng: I am late each day to university.
result.ga: bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.orig: bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoil
result.html: bím mall 'chuile lá ag teacht chuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.
result.ponchtml: bím mall 'ċuile lá ag teaċt ċuig an ollscoilI am late each day to university.

result.eng: Are you late waking up each morning?
result.ga: an mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'chuile mhaidin
result.orig: an mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'chuile mhaidin
result.html: an mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'chuile mhaidinAre you late waking up each morning?
result.ponchtml: an mbíonn tú mall ag éirí 'ċuile ṁaidinAre you late waking up each morning?

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ga: bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.orig: bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.html: bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ponchtml: bíonn mo ċuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceaṫair a ċlog ċuile ṫráṫnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: We are in the restaurant each day.
result.ga: bíonn muid sa mbialann gach lá
result.orig: bíonn muid sa mbialann gach lá
result.html: bíonn muid sa mbialann gach láWe are in the restaurant each day.
result.ponchtml: bíonn muid sa mbialann gaċ láWe are in the restaurant each day.

result.eng: Put this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.
result.ga: cuir an t-ungadh seo ar do lámh 'chuile mhaidin agus 'chuile oíche
result.orig: cuir an t-ungadh seo ar do lámh 'chuile mhaidin agus 'chuile oíche
result.html: cuir an t-ungadh seo ar do lámh 'chuile mhaidin agus 'chuile oíchePut this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.
result.ponchtml: cuir an t-ungaḋ seo ar do láṁ 'ċuile ṁaidin agus 'ċuile oíċePut this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.

result.eng: Don't forget the newspaper that we usually have each day.
result.ga: ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéar mar a bhíonn againn gach lá
result.orig: ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéar mar a bhíonn againn gach lá
result.html: ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéar mar a bhíonn againn gach láDon't forget the newspaper that we usually have each day.
result.ponchtml: ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéar mar a ḃíonn againn gaċ láDon't forget the newspaper that we usually have each day.

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ponchtml: níl aon údar agamsa lena ċeapaḋ naċ raiḃ aiṫne acu ar a ċéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.eng: There are three letters at the end of each file name to indicate what type of file it is.
result.ga: bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá ann
result.orig: bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá ann
result.html: bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá annThere are three letters at the end of each file name to indicate what type of file it is.
result.ponchtml: bíonn trí litir ag deireaḋ ainm gaċ coṁaid ċun a ċur in iúl cén cineál coṁaid atá annThere are three letters at the end of each file name to indicate what type of file it is.

result.eng: They were walking towards each other.
result.ga: bhí siad ag siúl i dtreo a chéile
result.orig: bhí siad ag siúl i dtreo a chéile
result.html: bhí siad ag siúl i dtreo a chéileThey were walking towards each other.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag siúl i dtreo a ċéileThey were walking towards each other.

result.eng: They were nodding at each other.
result.ga: bhí siad ag sméideadh ar a chéile
result.orig: bhí siad ag sméideadh ar a chéile
result.html: bhí siad ag sméideadh ar a chéileThey were nodding at each other.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag sméideaḋ ar a ċéileThey were nodding at each other.

result.eng: They passed each other at a slow, even pace.
result.ga: bhí siad ag scoitheadh a chéile go mall tomhasta
result.orig: bhí siad ag scoitheadh a chéile go mall tomhasta
result.html: bhí siad ag scoitheadh a chéile go mall tomhastaThey passed each other at a slow, even pace.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag scoiṫeaḋ a ċéile go mall toṁastaThey passed each other at a slow, even pace.

result.eng: We said goodbye to each other for the night.
result.ga: d'fhág muid slán ag a chéile don oíche
result.orig: d'fhág muid slán ag a chéile don oíche
result.html: d'fhág muid slán ag a chéile don oícheWe said goodbye to each other for the night.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág muid slán ag a ċéile don oíċeWe said goodbye to each other for the night.

result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ga: faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na stáit aontaithe
result.orig: faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na stáit aontaithe
result.html: faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na stáit aontaitheBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ponchtml: faoi 1865 ḃí úinéaraċt daoine in aġaiḋ an dlí in gaċ ceann de na stáit aontaiṫeBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.

result.eng: Each man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ga: d'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.orig: d'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéal
result.html: d'ól 'ach aon fhear acu tarraingt a chinn den bhuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.
result.ponchtml: d'ól 'aċ aon ḟear acu tarraingt a ċinn den ḃuidéalEach man drank his fill from the bottle.

result.eng: They grew up next door to each other.
result.ga: tógadh sa doras ag a chéile iad
result.orig: tógadh sa doras ag a chéile iad
result.html: tógadh sa doras ag a chéile iadThey grew up next door to each other.
result.ponchtml: tógaḋ sa doras ag a ċéile iadThey grew up next door to each other.
